about_the_game:
COMING SOON, OCTOBER 2024. WISHLIST US TO STAY UPDATED!

In this darkly captivating idle clicker game, you are the mastermind behind an otherworldly operation. Guide Shoggoth through the twisted art of harvesting not just organs but the very essence of humanity itself—souls and consciousness. As you delve into the metaphysical, your macabre farm on the fringes of reality attracts the gaze of eldritch entities from the shadowy depths of Innsmouth and beyond.

Your sinister sanctuary serves the unspeakable desires of vampires, zombies, and skeletons, turning blood and terror into gold. With each click, unlock the secrets of existence and expand your dominion to please the most ancient and powerful customers. Will you rise to become the ultimate purveyor of the paranormal, or will the abyss gaze back into you?

Step into a realm where the stakes are as high as the heavens and the depths of your ambition unfathomable. Only the most daring will attract the attention of the cosmos itself.

HIGHLIGHTS

  • Riveting idler & clicker full of dark humor and macabre goodness.
  • Breed humans, just like your mother taught you.
  • Become a successful harvester of blood, bones, and organs.
  • Vampires! Gorgons! MONSTERS!

FEATURES

  • Master the Macabre: Dive into a world where complexity grows as smoothly as shadows at dusk. Our game ensures that managing your eerie estate remains an enchanting experience, no matter how vast your organ harvesting operation becomes.
  • Thrills and Chills at Every Upgrade: Venture deeper into the night with upgrades that demand daring decisions. As the stakes rise like a full moon, earn prestige to unlock forbidden powers and face the challenges that lurk in the darkness.
  • A Realm of Endless Night: In this ever-evolving nightmare, every choice whispers promises of power and peril. Customize your dark domain and navigate through decisions that will shape the destiny of your nocturnal empire. What twisted paths will you tread?
  • Unearth Hidden Horrors: Secrets are buried deep within the heart of our game, waiting for the brave (or the mad) to discover them. Unlock chilling content, stumble upon ghastly upgrades, and participate in mysterious events. Achievements are not just earned; they're unearthed.
  • Decisions Drenched in Darkness: Every choice carries weight in the gloom. From expanding your ghoulish production to choosing which macabre machinery to enhance or deciding how to allocate your sinister resources, your decisions will cast long shadows on your journey. How will you balance the insatiable demands of your monstrous clients with the sustainability of your unholy enterprise?

COMING SOON, OCTOBER 2024. WISHLIST US TO STAY UPDATED!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10+
  • Processor: Core i3 and up
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb video memory, OpenGL 3.2
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Mortal Holdings

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 | AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In this macabre clicker, help Shoggoth keep his Mortal Holdings human farm in good standing among the monsters of Innsmouth.
